reviewText: Spencer is a likable actor and great for the roles he plays.  Sure the films are a lot of mayhem and ridiculous fights but Spencer adds a lot of laid back character.  He also has a lot of good chemistry with any small children he acts with.  Letieri usually has roles as really bad men.  It was nice to see him as a good guy.
Classic Bud Spencer,this is good fun watch this and you will want to collect all of Buds Movies.
